meta.description: The wealthy countries continue to focus on subsidizing intermittent electricity from breezes and sunshine while developing countries and those not within the elite core of society, suffer from shortages and inflation. The post Is net zero emissions the Trojan Horse for society? appeared first on CFACT. via CFACT https://ift.tt/CpD0gRe September 13, 2022 at 04:20AM

title: Is net zero emissions the Trojan Horse for society?
cleaned_text:
The wealthy countries continue to focus on subsidizing intermittent electricity from breezes and sunshine while developing countries and those not within the elite core of society, suffer from shortages and inflation.

The post Is net zero emissions the Trojan Horse for society? appeared first on CFACT.
